<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Internal Compartment](/Feats.aspx?ID=2462) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Android" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=334" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 72 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can hide a small object of up to light Bulk inside a hollow cavity on one of your forearms. It takes three Interact actions to store an object in this way. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to the DCs of checks for others to [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) or [Steal](/Actions.aspx?ID=68) objects stored inside your arm. If you store a weapon in your arm, you can use a single action to Interact to draw the weapon into the hand corresponding to your internal cavity, then Strike with the weapon.
name: Internal Compartment
